info.name: Fitocracy - Prop Bomber's Toolbox
info.description:
FEATURES:
  • Hides all workouts, comments, and other posts
  • "Give Props" button is massive and turns purple on hover
NOTE: Prop Bomber's Toolbox is a weapon of mass motivation, used purely for prop bombing, as it removes all social features. When you hit the end of the profile, deactivate PBT and use CTRL+F to find and read any possibly interesting posts on the victim's profile you noted on the way down. Use this tool wisely. Join the Prop Bomber's Toolbox group on Fitocracy for updates.
